scripts.build: npm install && sass scss/main.scss css/main.min.css && cleancss -o ./css/main.min.css ./css/main.min.css && uglifyjs ./node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/javascripts/bootstrap.js -o ./js/bootstrap.min.js && uglifyjs ./node_modules/html5shiv/dist/html5shiv.min.js -o ./js/html5shiv.min.js
